ygData.subject: EQ_Neriak created
ygData.msgSnippet: Crossposted on the Shadowknight mailing list. (Why are there two lists when one would better?) I just started a Dark Elf Shadow Knight on the Test server.
ygData.messageBody:
Crossposted on the Shadowknight mailing list.
(Why are there two lists when one would
better?)

I just started a Dark Elf Shadow Knight on the Test server. Long story short, my system freezes on Veehsan and test has a much lower head count.

I have questions about newbie fodder.

I've seen one skeleton pet, but don't think
that should be my first target.

I've seen the 3 ghouls, and one that parades
around The Lodge of the Dead, are these
the equivilent of rats, bats and snakes in Freeport?

Maxlis
